page.title: 01INDUSTRY IN NEWRY.
page.content: INDUSTRY NEWRY'S INDUSTRIAL ESTATE The Greenbank Industrial Estate, established in 1955 on the Warrenpoint Road,Newry,has 30 factories.Ten are less than five years old,five are between five and ten years old and three are over ten years old.The first factory in the Estate was Ulster Textiles.The largest factory is Glen Electrics.Originally Glen Electrics had 150 workers.Now it has 600,the largest number of workers in the Estate. Eight factories have closed down because of lack of money or they could not sell their products,or had bad managment.There are many small factories,one of which makes furniture and employs six workers.
